metadataAttributes.Title: Cloud Computing Law: Data Protection and Cybersecurity
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Vast amounts of personal information are processed in the cloud. But who is legally responsible for such ‘personal data’ in cloud environments? What duties do cloud providers like Amazon, Microsoft, and Google have? And what rights can you, as an individual, exercise under data protection law? If you’d like to find out, then this course is for you!
metadataAttributes.Skills: Cybersecurity Regulation,Cloud Services,General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR),International Transfers of Personal Data,Cloud Computing,
